console.wrongSystem: This module is designed for the Dragonbane system

debug.rangeRules: Range rules: Standard melee=2m, Long melee=4m, Ranged=weapon range

enabled.name: Enable Combat Assistant
enabled.hint: Automatically show rules when combat actions are used in chat

delay.name: Display Delay (milliseconds)
delay.hint: How long to wait before showing rules after an action is detected

showParryDurability.name: Show Weapon Durability for Parry
showParryDurability.hint: Display weapon durability when showing parry rules (shows the damage threshold that would break the weapon)

enableParryMovementReminders.name: OPTIONAL RULE: Enable Parry Movement Reminders
enableParryMovementReminders.hint: Show the optional parry movement rule (move yourself and enemy 2m on successful parry)

enforceTargetSelection.name: Enforce Target Selection
enforceTargetSelection.hint: Require players to select a target before making any attack

enforceRangeChecking.name: Enforce Range Checking
enforceRangeChecking.hint: Validate that attacks are within weapon range (melee: adjacent, ranged: up to 2x base range)

enableShoveReminders.name: OPTIONAL RULE: Enable Shove Rule Reminders
enableShoveReminders.hint: Show shove rule reminders for melee special attacks when STR damage bonus allows it

enableDodgeMovementReminders.name: Enable Dodge Movement Reminders
enableDodgeMovementReminders.hint: Show movement reminders for successful EVADE rolls

debugMode.name: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable debug logging to console (for troubleshooting)

enableEncumbranceMonitoring.name: Enable Encumbrance Monitoring
enableEncumbranceMonitoring.hint: Automatically monitor character encumbrance and apply status effects when over-encumbered

encumbranceMonitorFolder.name: Encumbrance Monitor Folder
encumbranceMonitorFolder.hint: Name of the actor folder to monitor for encumbrance (leave blank to monitor all characters)

encumbranceStatusEffect.name: Encumbrance Status Effect
encumbranceStatusEffect.hint: Name of the status effect to apply when over-encumbered (will be created automatically with anchor icon if it doesn't exist)

encumbranceChatNotifications.name: Encumbrance Chat Notifications
encumbranceChatNotifications.hint: Also create chat messages for encumbrance changes (in addition to UI notifications)

validation.selectToken: Please select your token before attacking with {weapon}.
validation.noWeapon: You do not have the weapon {weapon}!
validation.noTarget: Please target a token before attacking with {weapon}.
validation.tooManyTargets: Please target only one token for {weapon}.
validation.meleeOutOfRange: Target is too far away! {weapon} is a {weaponType} and must be {maxRange} the target, but target is {distance}m away.
validation.rangedOutOfRange: Target is too far away! {weapon} has a maximum range of {maxRange}m, but target is {distance}m away.

parry.reaction: Parrying uses your action for the turn (reaction)
parry.success: Success = no damage. If damage > durability, weapon damaged until repaired
parry.piercing: Piercing attacks cannot damage parrying weapons/shields
parry.monster: Monster attacks cannot be parried (unless specified)
parry.movement: Success = move yourself and enemy 2m (doesn't count as movement, no free attacks)
parry.dragon: Dragon = counterattack (cannot be dodged/parried). If attacker rolled Dragon, need Dragon to parry (no counterattack)

disarm.skillRoll: Opponent makes opposed weapon skill roll
disarm.success: Success = weapon lands D6 meters away (your choice of direction)
disarm.limitations: Cannot disarm shields or natural weapons

weakspot.piercing: Piercing weapons only: Target gaps in armor

shove.available: Bonus: STR advantage allows shoving {targetName} 2m in any direction

evade.movementAvailable: If Dodging: You may move up to 2m in any direction (no free attacks triggered)

weaponBroken.dialogExplanation: This will prevent its use until repaired.

errors.noPermission: You don't have permission to modify this weapon
errors.updateFailed: Failed to mark weapon as broken

encumbrance.strRollReminder: Must make STR rolls to move in combat or during travel shifts while over-encumbered.
